title.value: Responsibilities of a school hub manager

value.strong: Responsibilities of a school hub manager

ul.li: Set a semester club goal and set a plan to achieve the goal
Email your parent hub the School Hub Check List
Attend the parent hub meetings or meet with the parent hub manager at least twice per semester
Make sure club members record their service hours using the Doopoint System

ul.strong: By the end of the second semester
ul.li: Introduce new officer candidates to the parent hub toward the end of the second semester

Since Labdoo does not run with money, students are not expected to do fund raising at school. However, some schools require school clubs to participate the school fund raising events. If that's the case, the school hub has the right to decide how to best apply the club fund.
